name: Fitzgerald & CO
description:
Everyone at Fitzgerald & CO is bound by an unwavering belief that our clients’ success, and ours, requires intelligent thinking and unexpected thinking. Not one or the other, but both – no matter the product or service, no matter the target audience or medium. So we’ve surrounded ourselves with thoughtfully bold people and filled our roster with like-minded clients, all connected by smart, brave thinking and a desire to have fun in their work, in our partnerships and with each other.
Fitzgerald & CO’s mission is simple: to deliver brand fame and shareholder fortune by bringing intrigue to the everyday. We know of no products or services that can’t benefit from a creative solution. So we covet every opportunity to find the intrigue and to surprise the world with the answer.
READ MORE...
